assessment_item.subject: Botany
assessment_item.title: LAAPAR-Q4-அவசியமான தனிமங்கள் என்பது
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

அவசியமான தனிமங்கள் என்பது 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

தாவர சாம்பலில் காணப்படுகிறது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5080"},{"text":"

மண்ணிலிருந்து கிடைக்கின்றது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5081"},{"text":"

 தாவர வளர்ச்சியை முன்னேற்றுகிறது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5091"},{"text":"

தாவர வளர்ச்சிக்கு ஈடு செய்ய முடியாத மற்றும் இன்றியமையாதது 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:5096"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LAAPAR-Q4-அவசியமான தனிமங்கள் என்பது","title":"LAAPAR-Q4-அவசியமான தனிமங்கள் என்பது","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"DIFFICULT","contentType":"Resource","mimeType":"application/vnd.ekstep.ecml-archive","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
